metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44443 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
[GIMP PSP File Parsing Integer Overflow Remote Code ExecutionVulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44443` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
gimp-data - 2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
libgimp2.0 - 2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.10.1').
